nodes.text: Faerz Waleth was the manager of Sprawl 41, a Nebula Consumables-owned floating ranch on the planet Tyed Kant. He was a friend of Sehn Baroule, CEO of rival company Premier Provisions. When droids on Sprawl 41 began malfunctioning, Waleth at first suspected a group of strangers, actually Rebel agents, who had visited recently were to blame. He later discovered this was due to the Mynock virus.
